security.description: Ensure secure communication and avoid unsafe patterns.

patterns.description: Avoid using insecure protocols (FTP, SMTP, Telnet).
Prefer HTTPS over plain HTTP for external communication.

observability.description: Ensure services are observable (logs, metrics, tracing).

patterns.description: Ensure logs are present for debugging and monitoring.

modularity.description: Encourage loose coupling and modular services.

patterns.description: Prefer async messaging over direct synchronous calls when possible.

maintainability.description: Ensure code is maintainable and well-structured.

patterns.description: Avoid raw prints/logs, use proper logging libraries.
Track unresolved work or technical debt.

portability.description: Code should be portable across platforms.

patterns.description: Avoid hardcoded paths, use environment variables.
